name: The Red Lantern
overview: Choose wisely. Live wildly. The Red Lantern is a story-driven, rogue-lite, survival game where you and your team of 5 sled dogs, lost in the wilderness, must navigate the ever-changing encounters of the Alaskan bush to find your way home. Features: A dynamic world that changes as you play Nearly 100 different encounters each with varied results Gain items and upgrades as you discover things about the world around you 8 different pups to add to your team, each with their own personalities.
